casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Nashid Porter No. 153P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2016 Mr. Nashid Porter, Pro se. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 23rd of May 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, New Hanover County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2016."
